name: Season of Sharing Fund
description: Emergency rental and basic needs assistance to prevent homelessness
fullDescription: The Season of Sharing Fund, a partnership of the San Francisco Chronicle and Bay Area community foundations, provides emergency financial assistance to prevent homelessness for families and individuals in crisis.
whatTheyOffer:
- Emergency rental assistance
- Move-in cost support
- Basic needs assistance
- Prevents eviction and homelessness
- One-time financial support
- Available through partner agencies
howToGetIt:
1. Contact 2-1-1 or local social services
2. Get referral to Season of Sharing partner
3. Demonstrate financial emergency
4. Show risk of homelessness
5. Work with case manager
6. Funds paid directly to landlord/vendor
keywords: Season of Sharing, emergency assistance, rental assistance, eviction prevention, homelessness prevention, SF Chronicle, basic needs
